dialogue.introduction: I'm Shiranui. I look forward to your guidance and encouragement.
dialogue.library_intro: Second Kagerou-class destroyer, Shiranui. Along with the other Kageros I served as the escort for the Hawaii Operational Forces. In the fated Battle of Leyte Gulf, I was attached to Shima's fleet and rushed to the Surigao Strait.
dialogue.secretary1: What is it... did I make a mistake?
dialogue.secretary2: Do you have something for me to do?
dialogue.secretary3: Did you call for me, commander?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Shiranui is absolutely not bored. No, please don't mind me. Do as you like...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Is there something on Shiranui's face? ...I see, then... it's fine. No, it's nothing... Something wrong?
dialogue.wedding: Commander, what do you think of my battles...? Oh, I see... Well, that's fine too.
dialogue.equipment2: Oh. Good upgrade. I appreciate it.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Though I can still sail... but if it's an order...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I wont just sit here and accept this.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has been fully repaired.
dialogue.ship_construction: It appears a new ship is complete.
dialogue.night_battle: I will chase them down completely.
dialogue.mvp: I'm bored. Is there no more spirited foe?
dialogue.minor_damaged1: This level of damage won't sink me.
dialogue.sunk: If this is death, everyone is coming with me... That includes you.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, Isn't today a really important day? Really...? Well then, it's delightful!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: No. Shiranui will not buy such a.... Fine. No way around it. Ah, this might work.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: No way, I'm always going out at sea. I don't need a swimsuit just because its summer...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Nom...Christmas is fine ... isn't it? I don't think its bad.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: December and cleaning... yeah. Admiral, what is it? Is there a mistake in Shiranui's cleaning?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, Happy New Year. What is it? Is there something on Shiranui's face?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: So I throw these beans at Kinu, right? She's not here... Well then, I'll throw at Hayashimo instead. Hah!
